0110001111001110 1010101000010000 1 -> sum: 0000110111011111, cout: 1

1010000000001000 0011010001100001 1 -> sum: 1101010001101010, cout: 0
1110000101011101 1100010111000100 0 -> sum: 1010011100100001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
